about_the_game:
Watch Instagram Reels in an overlay without ever leaving or pausing the game you're playing, Skip and Like with keybinds and mouse buttons

What you need:

  • An Instagram account

  • Someone with a messed up attention span

  • Ability to click some buttons

  • A computer that can play videos and play games at the same time

Made in England with love, enjoy the app!

I hope we can all fix our attention spans at some point in our lives

Instagram is a trademark of Instagram LLC.  All content viewed in this app is based on recommendation provided by the Instagram algorithm moderated as per the Instagram Community Guidelines, ReelsFest is not responsible for any errors in regards to the content you view in the app

However, you can restrict the recommendation of sensitive content in your account settings

name: ReelsFest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD / AMD Radeon Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Possible in-game performance degradation when overlay is active on systems without Dedicated Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: ReelsFest is an in-game overlay application for watching Instagram Reels on top of any game/app on Windows, with the ability to skip and interact with the video using global keybinds and mouse buttons, without having to leave or pause your game. Requires an Instagram account
